mdRecord.dcterms:description: Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
MAY 2, 2013 | 3:31 PM -- FINALS MUTHA FUCKA | MAY 1, 2017 | 11:10 pm -- FINALS MUTHAFUKA | May 2, 2018 -- 9:56 PM -- FINALS MUTHAFUCKA | Jesus came to save sinners
